      • logout

        @Path(value="{id}/logout")
@POST
public void logout(@PathParam(value="id")
                    String id)
        Remove all user sessions associated with this user. And, for all client that have an admin URL, tell them to invalidate the sessions for this particular user.
        Parameters:
        id - user id

@PUT
@Consumes(value="application/json")
public void resetPassword(@PathParam(value="id")
                                   String id,
                                   CredentialRepresentation pass)
        Set up a temporary password for this user. User will have to reset this temporary password when they log in next.
        Parameters:
        id -
        pass - temporary password

      • executeActionsEmail

        @Path(value="{id}/execute-actions-email")
@PUT
@Consumes(value="application/json")
public javax.ws.rs.core.Response executeActionsEmail(@PathParam(value="id")
                                                              String id,
                                                              @QueryParam(value="redirect_uri")
                                                              String redirectUri,
                                                              @QueryParam(value="client_id")
                                                              String clientId,
                                                              List<String> actions)
        Send an email to the user with a link they can click to reset their password. The redirectUri and clientId parameters are optional. The default for the redirect is the account client.
        Parameters:
        id -
        redirectUri - redirect uri
        clientId - client id
        Returns:

      • sendVerifyEmail

        @Path(value="{id}/send-verify-email")
@PUT
@Consumes(value="application/json")
public javax.ws.rs.core.Response sendVerifyEmail(@PathParam(value="id")
                                                          String id,
                                                          @QueryParam(value="redirect_uri")
                                                          String redirectUri,
                                                          @QueryParam(value="client_id")
                                                          String clientId)
        Send an email to the user with a link they can click to verify their email address. The redirectUri and clientId parameters are optional. The default for the redirect is the account client.
        Parameters:
        id -
        redirectUri - redirect uri
        clientId - client id
        Returns:
